tool_description: Performs comprehensive integrity verification of documents to ensure they haven't been tampered with or corrupted before digital signing.

document_path.description: Path to the document file to check

error_messages: Integrity violation: Document shows signs of tampering or corruption.
Hash mismatch: Document hash does not match expected value.
Signature verification failed: Existing digital signatures are invalid or compromised.
Checksum error: Document checksums indicate potential data corruption.
usage: Provide document_path and configure integrity check options. Include expected_hash for verification against known good state. Returns detailed integrity assessment.

existing_signatures.description: Status of any existing digital signatures
